EmailTemplate.name: Email 2b: Vaccine Verification Results (REJECTED)
EmailTemplate.subject: [Action Required] Your COVID-19 vaccination record has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
-Please do not forward- Hi {!Contact.Name},
To ensure the health and safety of our in-person attendees, and the community at Davos, we have protocols in place before and during the event.
Upon review, your COVID-19 vaccination record was not accepted. Your vaccination record was rejected because: {!vaxhv__Health_Verification__c.vaxhv__RejectedReason__c}
If you think this decision was made in error, please respond to this email (davos@salesforce.com) with your concern. You can also come visit us at the Salesforce Welcome Center with your vaccination card.
Salesforce welcome center is located at: 81 Promenade, Davos Platz * Monday - Tuesday from 6:30 a.m. - 8:30 p.m. CET * Wednesday from 6:30 a.m. - 11:59 p.m. CET
Check your status: https://safetycloudfy23.secure.force.com/wefdavos
Health Verification ID: {!vaxhv__Health_Verification__c. Name}_{!vaxhv__Health_Verification__c.vaxhv__ExternalId__c}
Questions? Please reach out to davos@salesforce.com.
Thanks, Salesforce Davos Team
Please note that any handling of your personal data will be done in accordance with the Salesforce Privacy Statement.
